desc: Your request is invalid
Your request lacks valid authentication credentials for the requested resource
You need to pay to access this content
You are not allowed to access this page
The page you requested does not exist
The target resource does not support this HTTP method
Some "Accept" header you requested cannot be fulfilled
Your request lacks valid authentication credentials for the proxy
Your request was too slow
Your request conflicts with the current state of the target resource
The page you requested was permanently removed
Your request is missing the "Content-Length" header
Some condition you requested with your headers could not be fulfilled
You send more data than allowed
The URL is too long
Your request payload uses an unsupported format, "Content-Type" or "Content-Encoding" headers
The "Range" header you sent makes no sense
The server refuses the attempt to brew coffee with a teapot
You are sending request way too fast, chill a bit
The request was directed to a server that is not able to produce a response
Your request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors
The resource you are trying to access is locked
Your request failed due to failure of a previous request
The server is unwilling to risk processing a request that might be replayed
The current protocol is not supported, please upgrade to a different protocol
Your request must be conditional
You are sending requests too fast
The header fields you send are too large
You requested a resource that cannot legally be provided
The server could not process your request
The resource does currently not support the requested functionality
The proxy received an invalid response when requesting your resource
The server is currently unable to serve your request, please try again later
The proxy encountered a timeout when requesting your resource
The HTTP version you used for the request is not supported by the server
Internal server configuration error: the chosen variant is itself configured to engage in content negotiation, so is not a proper negotiation endpoint
The server has not enough free space to store this
The server detected an infinite loop while processing the request
You requested an HTTP Extension that should be used to process the request, but the extension is not supported
You need to authenticate to gain network access
